game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 하수구에서 곧바로 거북이 형제와 함께 충격적인 규모의 새로운 모험에 빠져보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Join the Turtle brothers straight from the sewers and slide into this new adventure of shell-shocking proportions!

reviewHighlights.text: I'd say this is unfortunately a bargain bin game, like most of Outright Games published games. I like that there's local 2 player co-op, though it's f...
I gotta say, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles was really fun for me for the first time in a long while. It totally brought back those good old Activision...
